description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76018-EWING SARCOMA/PRIMITIVE NEUROECTODERMAL TUMOR: Biopsy.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify tumor site.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (length).

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (width).

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Tumor Size.

columns.name: EXTRAOSS_TMR_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Extent of Primary Extraosseous Tumors.

columns.name: DIST_CLSEST_BNE_MRG
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Distance of Tumor from Closest Bone Margin.

columns.name: DIST_CLSEST_SFT_TIS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Distance of Tumor from Closest Soft Tissue Margin.

columns.name: NECROSIS_POSTCHEM_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Necrosis Postchemotherapy.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries:

Necrosis present


Cannot be determined


Not applicable

columns.name: CYTOGENETICS_C_NAME
columns.description:

Performed

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify cytogenetics.
